name: The Simpsons: Hit & Run
notes:
IMPORTANT NOTES, PLEASE READ:
You may have to drag the installer window around to look for important windows spawning UNDER the install window, such as the one for selecting additional discs as the installer requires them.

As the game installer is running, everything on your computer OTHER THAN the installer windows may appear to visually freeze, upon finishing and closing the installer everything will return to normal.

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Vivendi Universal Games/The Simpsons Hit & Run/Simpsons.exe

insert-disc.message: Insert disc 1 out of 3 from the Simpsons Hit & Run CD set.

task.description: Executing game installer EXE. When prompted for a setup type, select 2. Full Install. Keep the default destination location, and program folder. When prompted to install DirectX 8.1, select no.
task.name: wineexec

extract.description: Applying SecuROM removal patch to game EXE.
extract.dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Vivendi Universal Games/The Simpsons Hit & Run/

content:
files:
- hnr_patch: https://lutris.net/files/games/the-simpsons-hit-and-run/the-simpsons-hit-and-run-patch.tar.xz
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Vivendi Universal Games/The Simpsons Hit & Run/Simpsons.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix.
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- insert-disc:
    description: Waiting for game installer EXE.
    message: Insert disc 1 out of 3 from the Simpsons Hit & Run CD set.
    requires: AutoRunLauncher.exe
- task:
    description: Executing game installer EXE. When prompted for a setup type, select
      2. Full Install. Keep the default destination location, and program folder.
      When prompted to install DirectX 8.1, select no.
    executable: $DISC/AutoRunLauncher.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    description: Applying SecuROM removal patch to game EXE.
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Vivendi Universal Games/The Simpsons Hit &
      Run/
    file: hnr_patch
system:
  MouseWarpOverride: enable
  xboxdrv: --deadzone=6000 --trigger-as-button=true
wine:
  version: esync-3.13-x86_64
